MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 29-OCT-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the EH7 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am to repair 3rd party damage to our underground cable located on Loaning Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:17am on Thursday, 29 October 2020
